channel.title: Automation project on Pamasol Electrics Portal
channel.description: Recent content in Automation project on Pamasol Electrics Portal

item.title: Definition of task
item.description: Desrciption of process flow As shown in the animation above, the Pick&Placer should be programmed as follows, including the visualization of the touch panel. At first the Pick&Placer is retracted and the conveyor is not running The operator places a container on the conveyor at the inlet light barrier 100BG1 and presses the button Start. The container gets transported to the separator and stops there The Pick&Placer moves down, sucks a lid from the magazine, moves up and to the front and down again on top of the container.
